dialogue.speaker: Waiter
dialogue.english: Good evening! Welcome to our restaurant. How many are in your party?
dialogue.arabic: مساء الخير! مرحباً بك في مطعمنا. كم عدد أفراد طاولتك؟

dialogue.speaker: Parent
dialogue.english: Good evening! There are four of us, please.
dialogue.arabic: مساء الخير! نحن أربعة، من فضلك.

dialogue.speaker: Waiter
dialogue.english: Excellent! Right this way. Here are your menus. Please have a seat.
dialogue.arabic: ممتاز! تابعني. إليكم القائمة. من فضلك اجلسوا.

dialogue.speaker: Child 1
dialogue.english: Thank you!

dialogue.speaker: Child 2
dialogue.english: I'm excited!

dialogue.speaker: Parent
dialogue.english: Let's see what they have on the menu. What are you in the mood for?
dialogue.arabic: لنرى ماذا لديهم في القائمة. ماذا ترغبون في تناوله؟

dialogue.speaker: Child 1
dialogue.english: I want pizza!

dialogue.speaker: Child 2
dialogue.english: I like spaghetti!

dialogue.speaker: Parent
dialogue.english: Great choices! And for you, honey?

dialogue.speaker: Child 3
dialogue.english: I'll have a cheeseburger, please!

dialogue.speaker: Waiter
dialogue.english: Thank you for your orders. I'll be back shortly with your drinks.

dialogue.speaker: Child 1
dialogue.english: Can I have a cola, please?
dialogue.arabic: هل يمكنني الحصول على كولا، من فضلك؟

dialogue.speaker: Child 2
dialogue.english: I'd like a lemonade, please!

dialogue.speaker: Child 3
dialogue.english: I want apple juice!

dialogue.speaker: Parent
dialogue.english: I'll have a black coffee, please.

dialogue.speaker: Waiter
dialogue.english: Got it. I'll be back shortly with your drinks.

dialogue.speaker: Child 1
dialogue.english: I can't wait to eat!

dialogue.speaker: Child 2
dialogue.english: Me too!

dialogue.speaker: Child 3
dialogue.english: I'm hungry!

dialogue.speaker: Parent
dialogue.english: It won't be long now. Let's enjoy our meal!
dialogue.arabic: لن يمر وقت طويل الآن. دعونا نستمتع بوجبتنا!

dialogue.speaker: Waiter
dialogue.english: Here are your drinks. Are you ready to order?
dialogue.arabic: إليكم مشروباتكم. هل أنتم جاهزون لتقديم الطلب؟

dialogue.speaker: Child 1
dialogue.english: Yes, I'd like a Margherita pizza, please.
dialogue.arabic: نعم، أود بيتزا مارغريتا، من فضلك.

dialogue.speaker: Child 2
dialogue.english: I'll have the spaghetti with marinara sauce, please.
dialogue.arabic: سأتناول المعكرونة بصلصة المارينارا، من فضلك.

dialogue.speaker: Child 3
dialogue.english: I want a cheeseburger with fries, please!
dialogue.arabic: أريد شيز برجر مع بطاطس مقلية، من فضلك!

dialogue.speaker: Parent
dialogue.english: I'd like the grilled salmon, please.
dialogue.arabic: أرغب في السمك السلمون المشوي، من فضلك.

dialogue.speaker: Waiter
dialogue.english: Thank you for your orders. I'll bring them to you shortly.

dialogue.speaker: Child 1
dialogue.english: I hope it tastes as good as it smells!
dialogue.arabic: آمل أن يكون الطعم جيدًا مثل الرائحة!

dialogue.speaker: Child 2
dialogue.english: Me too! I love spaghetti!

dialogue.speaker: Parent
dialogue.english: And I'm really looking forward to this grilled salmon.
dialogue.arabic: وأنا أتطلع حقًا إلى هذا السمك السلمون المشوي.

dialogue.speaker: Waiter
dialogue.english: Here are your dishes. Enjoy your meal!

dialogue.speaker: Child 1
dialogue.english: It looks delicious!

dialogue.speaker: Child 2
dialogue.english: Yummy!

dialogue.speaker: Child 3
dialogue.english: I can't wait to bite into this burger!
dialogue.arabic: لا أستطيع الانتظار لدغة هذا البرجر!

dialogue.speaker: Parent
dialogue.english: Bon appétit, everyone!

dialogue.speaker: Waiter
dialogue.english: Is everything to your satisfaction?

dialogue.speaker: Child 1
dialogue.english: Yes, it's delicious! Thank you!

dialogue.speaker: Child 2
dialogue.english: It's amazing!

dialogue.speaker: Child 3
dialogue.english: I love it!

dialogue.speaker: Parent
dialogue.english: The salmon is cooked perfectly. Thank you!
dialogue.arabic: السلمون مطهو بشكل مثالي. شكراً لك!

dialogue.speaker: Waiter
dialogue.english: You're very welcome! Would anyone like dessert?
dialogue.arabic: أنتم مرحبون جدًا! هل أحد يرغب في الحلوى؟

dialogue.speaker: Child 1
dialogue.english: I want chocolate cake!

dialogue.speaker: Child 2
dialogue.english: Can I have an ice cream, please?
dialogue.arabic: هل يمكنني الحصول على آيس كريم، من فضلك؟

dialogue.speaker: Child 3
dialogue.english: I'd like a fruit salad, please!
dialogue.arabic: أرغب في سلطة فواكه، من فضلك!

dialogue.speaker: Parent
dialogue.english: I'll have a cup of coffee, please. And the check, when you're ready.
dialogue.arabic: سأتناول فنجان قهوة، من فضلك. والفاتورة عندما تكون جاهزة.

dialogue.speaker: Waiter
dialogue.english: Of course! I'll bring your desserts and the check right away.
dialogue.arabic: بالطبع! سأحضر الحلوى والفاتورة على الفور.

dialogue.speaker: Child 1
dialogue.english: I can't wait for dessert!

dialogue.speaker: Child 2
dialogue.english: Me neither!

dialogue.speaker: Child 3
dialogue.english: Fruit salad is my favorite!

dialogue.speaker: Parent
dialogue.english: It's been a wonderful dinner. Thank you for your great service!
dialogue.arabic: كانت وجبة عشاء رائعة. شكراً لخدمتكم الرائعة!

dialogue.speaker: Waiter
dialogue.english: You're very welcome! We're glad you enjoyed it. Have a fantastic evening!
dialogue.arabic: أنتم مرحبون جدًا! نحن سعداء أنكم استمتعتم. أتمنى لكم مساءً رائعًا!

dialogue.speaker: Child 1
dialogue.english: Goodbye!

dialogue.speaker: Child 2
dialogue.english: Goodbye!

dialogue.speaker: Child 3
dialogue.english: Goodbye!

dialogue.speaker: Parent
dialogue.english: Goodbye, and thank you!
